llm_calls.prompt:
<task>
Extract the accurate company name from this job application page.
</task>

<context>

COMPANY_LINKS: None

JOB_DESCRIPTION_SAMPLE: Back to jobsProduct Manager - AI Automations & IntegrationsRemoteApplyWe are a diverse and experienced global team of individuals with a common goal: to advance the cause of organizations through mobile fundraising. Tatango is built on 5 core principles, Tatango C.A.R.E.S. – Community, Autonomy, Respect, Excellence, and Spirit. In the spirit of our values, we know when we take care of our team members, they in turn help organizations achieve their best. And, that is why we celebrate amazing tale
</context>

<instructions>
1. The URL suggests the company name is "Tatango", but this may be an ASCII-only slug that differs from the actual display name
2. Look for the company name mentioned across multiple sources (headings, labels, links, description)
3. Prioritize:
   - Names that appear consistently across multiple sources
   - Proper capitalization and special characters (prefer "Zūm" over "Zum" or "Ridezum")
   - Names in navigation links to company homepage
   - Names in form labels like "Why do you want to work at [Company]?"
4. If multiple variations exist (e.g., "Ridezum" in URL vs "Zūm" on page), choose the properly formatted display name
5. Return ONLY the company name with no additional text or explanation
6. If no clear company name can be extracted from the context, return the URL company name as fallback
</instructions>

<output_format>
[Company Name Only]
</output_format>
